messages.title: THIS IS OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Marisha will fight to stop Brexit. She believes that Britain is stronger in the EU and will work to stop Brexit if elected.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet implies a tactical voting situation where supporting Marisha Ray could prevent a conservative majority.

issues.brexitEurope: Marisha Ray will fight to stop Brexit. She believes that Britain is stronger in the EU and will work to stop Brexit if elected.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour are backing the Conservative Brexit plan.
The Conservatives are dragging us out of the single market.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats' leaflet featuring Marisha Ray.
